     def animate(self):
         self.timer -= delta_time
         if self.timer <= 0:
             if self.current_x_frame < self.x_frames:
                 self.current_x_frame += 1
             elif self.current_y_frame < self.y_frames:

 def draw_sprite(sprite, x, y):

+def resize_sprite(sprite, dimensions):

     else:

     else:
